name: Space Escape (tbrooks3)
description: This is a simple crawler game made for my BSU Game Development class. I used Blender to create the models, character, and animations and Unreal Engine for everything else. I used Unreal Marketplace assets to build the map as well. The goal is to find 3 keys and make it to a secret room to escape. Your health constantly goes down and your stamina decreases when jumping. There are health and stamina pick ups with sound effects. There is also a light switch to turn on lights in a dark hallway and the electrical box has lighting effects (sparks).
